      • getMatiere

        public Matiere getMatiere(int id)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all subject in databases
        Parameters:
        id - The identifying number of the subject to retrieve from the database
        Returns:
        A Subject object with all their attributes from the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL Exception in case it didn't work properly

                                           throws java.sql.SQLException

        Parameters:

        nom_matiere - The name of the subject
        id_prof - The id of the professor
